item.title: Pennsylvania Votes Yes To Another Decade Of Leftist Supreme Court Activism
item.description: Big money was spent on advertising to retain the justices, promoting keeping them on the bench to 'protect' abortion access.

item.title: Chester County Poll Book Fiasco Highlights PA’s Election Integrity Issues
item.description: Election watchers were outraged over the inconvenience to voters and the election integrity weaknesses this situation has created.

item.title: Democrats Want Republicans To Bail Them Out Of Their Bad Political Gamble
item.description: By punting the issue into 2025, Democrats hoped they could secure a permanent extension of Obamacare subsidies. That plan backfired.

item.title: Behind Democrats’ Sob Stories Is A Push For More Tax Dollars To Insurance Companies
item.description: It's not a debate about lowering insurance costs. It's about how much of our tax dollars the government will give to private corporations.

item.title: Dems’ Election Day Sweep Is Not A Harbinger, It’s A Wake-Up Call For The Grand Old Party
item.description: Congressional Republicans need to do something worthy of voter support, and the party has to sharpen its early-voting ground game..
